law.catch_line: Procurement by Port of Miami Crane Management, Inc.

text.section:
Sec. 2-8.2.9. Procurement by Port of Miami Crane Management, Inc.
Notwithstanding and prevailing over any other provisions of the Code of Miami-Dade County to the contrary, no County procurement provisions including but not limited to Sections, (WBE), (HBE),,,, Art. II of, and (WBE) shall apply to any procurement conducted by Port of Miami Crane Management, Inc., a Florida not-for-profit corporation incorporated by the County as a separate legal entity for the purpose of managing the maintenance of the County's seaport gantry cranes and other cargo handling equipment. The provisions of Administrative Order 3-2, 3-4 and 3-16 are hereby waived as to all procurement conducted by Port of Miami Crane Management, Inc.
